Administrative_Tasks.Description: A collection of tasks performed by site adminstrators.

Force_Password_Change.Description: On next logon, force users to change their password.

Mass_Security_Group_Add.Description: Add a collection of users to a security group.

General_Tasks.Description: The tasks can be performed by power users to perform site-wide functions

Mass_File_Rename.Description: Rename all files in a target directory.

Mass_File_Deletion.Description: Delete all files in a target directory.

Generate_Icecream.Description: Generate more icecream than anyone knows what to do with.

Test Running Code.Description: For running additonal code tests using powershell script block from json

Running seperate Powershell script.Description: Will execute battlebit server list viewer
